methods.name: scanMediaFiles
methods.summary: Scans newly created or downloaded media files to make them available to other Android media providers, such as the Gallery.
methods.description:
Android scans media files for inclusion in the Gallery and other media providers. Use this method to force an immediate scan of particular files, such as newly-created or downloaded resources.

See MediaScannerConnection in the Android API Reference.

parameters.name: paths
parameters.summary: Array of paths to the files you want to scan.

parameters.name: mimeTypes
parameters.summary: Array of MIME types for the files in the paths parameter. If null, MIME type will be inferred from the file names.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Function to call when each file is done being scanned.

methods.name: setSystemWallpaper
methods.description: The image to use as the wallpaper must be passed as a Titanium.Blob. You can create a Blob from an image file by calling read. You can also use the openPhotoGallery or showCamera methods to allow users to select an existing photo or take a new one.

parameters.name: image
parameters.summary: Image to use as the wallpaper, as a Blob object.

parameters.name: scale
parameters.summary: If true, the image is scaled to fit the width of the system wallpaper. If false, the image is not scaled.
